message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share
You took a big chunk last time, now it's my turn to negotiate!
You took a bigger chunk last time, now it's my turn to take most of it
I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big!
I'll take a bit less, but still more than you last offered
I'll match your offer, but I think I deserve more
